# Gutwrench (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]], [[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Undead

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 97

The innards of the target creature roil. If the target fails its saving throw, its intestines burst forth, killing it. The intestines fly toward the caster and are absorbed into her form, granting her 4d6 temporary hit points and a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength. If the targetâ€™s save is successful, it takes 10d6 points of damage instead.

A creature with no discernible anatomy is unaffected by this spell.
